title: Price ceiling below Peq causes shortage

content.question: Which of the following will occur if the government imposes a price ceiling below the equilibrium price of a good?

choices.label: The quantity sold will exceed the equilibrium quantity.
Firmsâ€™ total revenues will increase if demand is price elastic.
There will be a shortage in the market.
All firms will shut down, since price is below the equilibrium price.
Price will exceed the marginal cost of producing the last unit sold.

content.answer: There will be a shortage in the market.
